articles.title: Pasteurized milk `safe` from bird flu: US health officials - WION
articles.description:
Pasteurized milk sold in US stores is safe from the bird flu because pasteurization effectively kills the disease, American health authorities said on Friday (Apr 26).

An outbreak of Highly Pathogenic Avian Influenza (HPAI) has made its way through dairy cat…

articles.title: Burkina Faso suspends BBC, Voice of America for reporting on army killings - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: In a new report, Human Rights Watch said military forces ‘summarily executed’ 223 civilians in February.
